text: No. Simmilar web is more accurate. We use combination of ahrefs + simmilar web (if we do not have acces to analytics). In ahrefs you can also see most shared articles (facebook,pinterest,twitter).

elements.text: No. Simmilar web is more accurate. We use combination of ahrefs + simmilar web (if we do not have acces to analytics). In ahrefs you can also see most shared articles (facebook,pinterest,twitter).

text: <@US3NM8ZHT> Love that you’re thinking about this, as I just joined a design agency to do just that. Not ready to talk about it just yet, but I would love to chat about it sometime. What I’ve learned just doing my research and poking around is indeed storytelling/audience dev is not a core function of any agency. Probably because 1) they’re too busy servicing clients and 2) many of them run on the old model of ad agencies (depending on awards, famous owners, etc.). The future of this is ripe. And no one is doing it.
